title: ArtyTorrent Pack 87-Methods Of Mayhem Industrial Toolkit-WAV
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 87-Methods Of Mayhem Industrial Toolkit-WAV
------------------------------------------------------------

Sony/Sonic Foundry presents a collection of sounds for the creation of Industrial music. Harsh guitars, feedback, garbled speech and distorted drums. <a href="
http://www.sonycreativesoftware.com/loop_libraries/showloop.asp?SPID=71" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.sonycreativesoftware.com/loop_libraries/showloop.asp?SPID=71</a>
Not for the faint-hearted!

Torrent contains 5 RAR files with 577 samples
---------------------------------------------
MoM Drum Oneshots (148)
MoM FX Loops (96)
MoM Nasty Loops (222)
MoM Spoken (93)
MoM Weird (18)

The vast majority of these samples were stereo files with identical info on the left and right hand sides. In such cases, I&#039;ve converted the files to mono to keep the filesize down.
I think my pack is missing a few drum loops from the full retail package, but this has plenty of stuff to be getting on with.

All files have been normalized, and are acidized 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz. 

--
Arty - "Noise annoys"
25th February 2008.
